
## Storytelling with Slides

In this section of the Secondary Soft Skills module for the MACEPA Data Fellowship Program, we are going to focus on how to use your powerpoint slide decks not just to impart information, but to tell a memorable story. This is a key step in turning your data analysis into memorable and actionable insights for policymakers.
